noAccount: No wallet selected. For publishing and downloading an asset you need to use one.
hasBurnerWallet: We created a temporary burner wallet for you, allowing you to use all Marketplace functionality without any setup on your side, and without a Web3-capable browser. This wallet will persist in your browser across sessions, but not across different browsers or devices. Never use this burner wallet to send or receive any tokens. To personalize your experience and improve your security migrate to MetaMask.

seedphrase: You can use this seed phrase to import this burner wallet account into other wallets, e.g. MetaMask.
